input: A user with an account can opt in for the use of contact information by a third party, which uses it for a purpose outside of our label scheme.
The public does see your user profile for an unspecified purpose. This applies to users with accounts. You can opt in for data collection for the collection or sharing and use of your information.

The site collects your cookies or tracking elements for service operations or security. Collection happens when you implicitly provide information on the website. You can configure your privacy with browser settings.
